metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16746 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in net/wireless/nl80211.c in the Linux kernelthrough 5.2.17. It does not check the length of variable elements in abeacon head, leading to a buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16746` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-72.81
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-72.81
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-72.81
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-72.81
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-72.81
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.0.0-37-generic - 5.0.0-37.40~18.04.1
